creator: TrueMyth Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Discover hidden boxes, wipe off the dust and find new items, merge them into useful tools and earn surprising treasures. You never know what awaits behind the next corner.

Let the mystery adventure begin! Unlock new areas, unveiling centuries-old family secrets on the way. With an abundant combination of items to discover and hundreds of engaging puzzles to solve, Miss Merge makes sure it always has new secrets waiting for you.

Features:

MERGE – Combine what you have into more useful tools. Can a screwdriver and an old satellite dish come in handy? You betcha. Merge items and solve the mystery.

DISCOVER –A story full of twists and turns. You’ll meet fun characters, a nasty nemesis, eccentric relatives and lots of suspicious locals all while trying to solve the grand mystery.
Find the hidden items and reveal the truth!

RELAX – as you play fun and interactive puzzle game

SOLVE the mysteries of the old cafe

PLAY FOR A WHILE OR FOR LONG – Have a quick merge minute here and there, or become absorbed into an engaging merge marathon.

– It’s time to kick off your journey, the mysterious story of Miss Merge awaits.
descriptionShort: Help Emily discover what her grandma has to reveal about the family's past!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Exciting Shop to get more energy and items to continue merging
- Minor bug fixes

Have some feedback? Send us email to missmergegame@gmail.com , we'd love to hear what you think

title: Miss Merge: Mystery Story

descriptionHtml:
Discover hidden boxes, wipe off the dust and find new items, merge them into useful tools and earn surprising treasures. You never know what awaits behind the next corner.

Let the mystery adventure begin! Unlock new areas, unveiling centuries-old family secrets on the way. With an abundant combination of items to discover and hundreds of engaging puzzles to solve, Miss Merge makes sure it always has new secrets waiting for you.

Discover hidden boxes, wipe off the dust and find new items, merge them into useful tools and earn surprising treasures. You never know what awaits behind the next corner.

Let the mystery adventure begin! Unlock new areas, unveiling centuries-old family secrets on the way. With an abundant combination of items to discover and hundreds of engaging puzzles to solve, Miss Merge makes sure it always has new secrets waiting for you.

Features:

MERGE – Combine what you have into more useful tools. Can a screwdriver and an old satellite dish come in handy? You betcha. Merge items and solve the mystery.

DISCOVER –A story full of twists and turns. You’ll meet fun characters, a nasty nemesis, eccentric relatives and lots of suspicious locals all while trying to solve the grand mystery.
Find the hidden items and reveal the truth!

RELAX – as you play fun and interactive puzzle game

SOLVE the mysteries of the old cafe

PLAY FOR A WHILE OR FOR LONG – Have a quick merge minute here and there, or become absorbed into an engaging merge marathon.

– It’s time to kick off your journey, the mysterious story of Miss Merge awaits.
descriptionShort: Merge the items, Follow the Story!

- new amazing chapter! Fantastic theme with hundreds of unique items, puzzles and fun
- Minor bug fixes

title: Miss Merge: Mystery Story

creator: TrueMyth Games Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Follow the mystery story of Grandma Margie and her granddaughter Emily to their hometown. Our free online merge adventure begins with a cafe in ruins, a bakery in struggle, lost boxes full of surprises, resourceful tools and hidden grand prizes!
Unlock new chapters, unfolding step by step the plot along the way. With an abundant combination of items and interactive tasks Miss Merge makes sure to always have new secrets to discover!
FEATURES
💜MERGE –items and explore their maximum potential! Transforming a small iron bolt to a full set toolbox, expand items to the max level and successfully complete each assigned task given!
⛰️ DISCOVER – a story full of twists and surprises. Exotic characters, a nasty nemesis, eccentric relatives and suspicious locals while trying to solve the grand mystery.
🏖️ RELAX – and have fun merging over thousand of items in each interactive story chapter while collecting you daily bonus rewards!
🔎 SOLVE - the dark secrets surrounding Grandma’s past by uncovering hidden items on each new chapter board!
🔓UNLOCK -powerful game boosters and use them to fulfil challenging tasks and engaging merging.
💥 MASTER - your skills with our ongoing events to win the best grand prizes!
⏳PLAY IT AT YOUR PACE – jump on board for a quick casual merge here and there or become absorbed into an engaging speed-merge marathon!
Download Now and Let the Merging Begin!
Need some help? Send us a message at hello@truemythgames.com
descriptionShort: Merge the items, Follow the Story!
